Wat is een full stack developer?: What is a full stack developer?
Als full stack developer kan ik zowel de: As a full stack developer I can realise both the frontend (that which the customer sees) and the backend (the central heart of the system). For example, on the backend I create a so-called API that can provide the frontend.

Wat is een hybride (cross platform) app?: What is a hybrid (cross platform) app?
In de begintijd van de apps moest je voo: In the early days of apps, you had to develop a separate app for each system (Android, iOS, etc...). Nowadays a hybrid app is the solution for most projects. This allows me to develop an app with a single codebase that runs on both Android and Apple iOS. Two birds with one stone!
